input: You need to install the latest version of Python
action_to_take: *** Missing python, add the following instruction in your Dockerfile 'RUN apk --update add make python gcc g++', see an example at https://github.com/openode-io/build-templates/blob/4480c96281ef40ce0a10ed9894da11a13871db9d/v1/templates/node-extras/Dockerfile#L8.
*** A package ([[1]]) seems to be missing and should be added using the Dockerfile.
